## Problem / Use Case

Describe the problem you're trying to solve or the use case for this feature.

## Proposed Solution

Describe your proposed solution or feature.

## Alternatives Considered

Have you considered any alternative approaches? If so, describe them.

## Additional Context

- Is this related to a specific genealogical workflow or standard?
- Would this feature affect existing functionality?
- Any relevant screenshots, mockups, or examples from other tools?

Link any related issues or discussions.
